text:
VAIBHAV                                                                                                  E-mail: vaibhavsharma.430@gmail.com
Mob: +91 
9560472505
Synopsis
CAD Engineer, creative and technically sound with excellent academics and
having 2+ years experiences, successfully handling Engineering Design Projects.
Proficient in the use of latest Design Engineering Software and IT Tools.
Customer focused and quality  conscious, capable of precisely understanding
client needs and delivering results within agreed time and budget.
Technical Competencies
CAD Tools (AutoCAD, Solid Works, NX 8.5)
Creation of Manufacturing Drawings.
GD & T with basics of ASME Standards.
Basic Knowledge of API standards (5B, 5C3, 5CT and RP 10F)
Communication Skills: - Written, Verbal.
Team Working Skills.
Basic Knowledge on Computer Hardware and Software tools.
Operating System, Windows Server, XP, Windows 7.0, Windows 8, Windows
10 and MS Office Products.
Expertise:
Product and Conceptual Design.
Design Engineer with extensive experience in downhole Cementing tools.
Legacy data conversions, which include Assembly, part modeling and detailing.
Generation of manufacturing drawings as per customer requirement within 
presently used standards.
Product Data Management.
Improvement in Present tools for Cost Cutting and better performance.
Summary of Work Experience
SLEDGEHAMMER OIL TOOLS PVT. LTD., Faridabad, India
CAD Engineer - Mechanical (May-2017 to Till Date).
Projects Handled  - SHOTPL, IndiaAbide by the Oilfield industry safety standards and ensure the products qualify
the safety standards per design perspective. 
Researches and analyses data such as customer design proposal to determine
feasibility  of  design  or  application  to  enhance  the  product  sustainability.
Applying customer specific standards and requirements.
Developing  detailed  Engineering  drawings  of  the  SledgeHammer  oilfield
products.
3D  CAD  Modelling  of  parts,  subassemblies,  and  Top  level  assemblies  and
creation of BOM.
Executing Engineering Change Requests (ECRs) per proposed changes by the
customer.
Collaborated  on  new  design  concepts  with  our  team  to  meet  customer
requirements, and implement the project of new equipment development. Ex:
Design of SledgeHammer reamer shoe with free rotating nose, SSR plug system,
Hydraulic and Mechanical stage tools for stage cementing.
To maintain API documentation of all project as per API-STANDARD and
coordinate in API audit.
To help testing manager in Float equipment HPHT tests, Centralizer restoring
force tests, and Stage tool testing.
Creation of marketing concern drawings (MCDs), technical specification sheets
and operating manuals.
Implement basic GD&T per ASME Y14.5-M 1994 standard where ever required
in the drawings.
CADD CENTRE, Faridabad, India
CAD Instructor - Mechanical (June-2016 to April-2017).
Projects Handled  - CADD CENTRE, Faridabad
Instruct  9-12  grade  introductory  and  advanced  courses  of  Computer  Aided
Drafting (CAD)
Work as a teacher within PDM & CAD as well as keeping existing educational
materials updated.
Instruct GD&T, AutoCAD 2D (Orthogonal and Isometric view), Solid works
and UG NX.
Organize Seminar in Technical Institutes and aware students about the benefits
of CAD.
Prepare  3D  Model  and  Drawing  of  different  Parts  and  Assemblies  as  per
customer requirement.
Provide CAD training to both technical students and Professionals.
Provide Technical Support to companies for Solid Works and AutoCAD 2D.
Prepare monthly reports.   Hobbies
Involving in technical discussions to learn more and hear technical lectures.
Travelling, and trekking. Meet different people and make good friends.
Internet Browsing for the knowledge purpose.
Academics
Diploma in Product Designing From CADD Centre.
Intermediate under C.B.S.E, Delhi from Vidya Niketan School No.2, Faridabad.
High School under C.B.S.E, Delhi from Vidya Niketan School No.2, Faridabad.
Training Programs
Completed  4  month  training  in  New  Product  Development  from  SHUBH
TECHNOLOGIES, FARIDABAD.
Completed 6 weeks training in Production and Maintenance Department from
JINDAL INDUSTRIES PVT. LTD., HISAR.
Completed 6 weeks training in Assembly Line from ESCORTS FARMTRACE,
FARIDABAD.
